name: Express.js-Challenge-Note-Taker
description: This project introduces Note Taker, an app designed for creating, storing, and retrieving notes. Powered by Express.js on the backend, it manages note data via a JSON file. Furthermore, seamless deployment on Heroku is part of the project scope.
